description:
Zeta Centauri Telnet is a telnet client used for connecting to remote servers and devices.  It supports ANSI colors and can be used for playing MUDs, controlling remote devices that allow terminal connections, or for telnet-based system administration.

It works with bluetooth keyboards and uses more of the screen when one is connected (you can click the blue + to enlarge the screen area when using an external keyboard).

Version 1.04 adds the ability to set which combination of carriage-return and line-feed characters to use for the connection, enabling operation with more devices and servers than previous versions.

This application does not support SSH.
